key_work.title: Mystiques
key_work.credit_line:
Key art, concept art & stills from Mystiques

Lemonade Games, Australia, 2025

Courtesy Lemonade Games
key_work.brief_description:
Mystiques is a haunted antiquing game about four chaotic women who turn to psychic powers to save their failing shop. Inspired by the quirky antique stores in the Blue Mountains and internet-famous grifters like Anna Delvey and Elizabeth Holmes, Mystiques is both a whimsical paranormal adventure and a girlcore inventory game.

To keep the store alive, players rummage through the belongings of the recently deceased, bargaining with spirits to find the most valuable relics to sell. Lemonade Games’ debut mixes spooky adventure with vintage flair, echoing films like Suspiria (1977) and Jennifer’s Body (2009). It’s about making money, dealing with ghosts, and maybe texting your ex (though probably not a great idea).

Mystiques is supported by Screen Australia and is currently under development.

start.title: The Addams Family
start.creator_credit: Barry Sonnenfeld, Ruth Myers, Dede Allen, Jim Miller, Scott Rudin, Orion Pictures, Paramount Pictures, Scott Rudin Productions, Richard Macdonald, Caroline Thompson and Larry Wilson
start.brief_description: When a man claiming to be long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after 25 years lost, the family plans a celebration to wake the dead. But the kids barely have time to warm up the electric chair before Morticia begins to suspect Fester is fraud when he can’t recall any of the details of Fester’s life.

links.description: Both films are iconic for featuring disembodied hands. The Production Designer of Talk to Me created the prop by making a mold of her own hand, while a magician acted as the hand Thing in The Addams Family.

start.title: Yellowjackets
start.creator_credit: Beer Christmas, Entertainment One, Entertainment One Television, Lock Jaw, Paramount Players and Showtime Networks
start.brief_description: This equal parts survival epic, psychological horror story and coming-of-age drama tells the saga of a team of wildly talented high school girls soccer players who become the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the remote northern wilderness. The series chronicles their descent from a complicated but thriving team to savage clans, while also tracking the lives they’ve attempted to piece back together nearly 25 years later.

end.title: Suspiria
end.creator_credit: Brad Fischer, David Kajganich, Francesco Melzi d'Eril, Gabriele Moratti, Luca Guadagnino, Marco Morabito, Silvia Venturini Fendi and William Sherak
end.headline_credit: Italy and United States of America, 2018
end.brief_description: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the troupe’s artistic director, an ambitious young dancer and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare, others will finally wake up.

constellations_other.name: Breaking the binary
constellations_other.description: Tilda Swinton name has become synonymous with androgyny since she first appeared on our screens in the mid-1980s, leading a cultural shift towards today’s understanding of gender as fluid and ever-changing. Orlando was key to establishing her influence and allure.
